volunteer.summary: Volunteered teaching 7th and 8th grade student the fundamentals of web development using technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript and JQuery.

projects.name: PMM Weekend Event Site
projects.decription: A Events website for an event I am currently working on.
projects.tasks: I created the entire site implementing stripe.com for payment and other technologies
projects.technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node JS, AWS(S3), MySQL

projects.name: Final Project â€“ Family Function
projects.decription: Website aimed towards connecting families without the help of social media.
projects.tasks: My contribution to this project was setting up the Photo Gallery, User profile, database to hold the images (AWS S3 & MySQL), setting up the Node to connect with both the MySQL and S3 database.
projects.technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React JS, Node JS, AWS(S3), MySQL

projects.name: DBLab - Blog Project
projects.decription: React based app to showcase message posting.
projects.task: I created a server and client side of this react app using MySQL database, stripe payment system, a mailing system, a JavaScript compiler, node server routing and authentication
projects.technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React JS, Node JS, MySQL, Passport JS, Stripe, Mailgun JS, Babel JS, Express JS

projects.name: Chirper
projects.decription: Create a front-end app using React.
projects.task: I created a timeline setup where messages can be posted and display so that people would be able to see and edit their messages as well by using React JS.

projects.name: API-React
projects.decription: Create a app that display people and film from a web API.
projects.task: I created the node server that will do a fetch request to the web API. By which I used the information to display a list of the information received (people and films) from the API.

projects.name: TypeWriter
projects.decription: Create a typing game using only jQuery.
projects.task: This project included uses of loops and conditional statements and DOM Manipulation.

projects.name: Promise-Lab
projects.decription: Showcasing the use of Promises in asynchronous JavaScript

projects.name: 99-Lines
projects.decription: Creating the lyrics of a song while implementing JavaScript concept of loops and conditional statements such as the "for loop".

projects.name: DOM-DOM-DOM
projects.decription: Create squares when clicked and deleted when double-clicked using DOM manipulation in JavaScript

projects.name: Resume
projects.decription: Creating a professional resume using HTML and CSS. This was the first project during class.
